providers.name: Open edX / Axim Collaborative
providers.description: The Open edX project is a collaboration between edX and the global open-source community. Axim Collaborative is the nonprofit organization that supports the Open edX project.

providers.name: Raccoon Gang (contributed to Open edX)
providers.description: Raccoon Gang is a leading provider of e-learning solutions, specializing in custom Open edX development, mobile applications, and educational technology consulting.

providers.name: Overhang.IO
providers.description: Overhang.IO is the company behind Tutor, the leading Open edX deployment and management tool. They provide commercial support and premium plugins for Open edX.

providers.name: OpenCraft
providers.description: OpenCraft is a specialized provider of Open edX hosting, development, and consulting services. They focus on creating scalable and custom e-learning solutions.

providers.name: edunext
providers.description: eduNEXT is a leading provider of Open edX solutions in Latin America, offering platform development, hosting, and educational technology consulting services.

providers.name: Appsembler
providers.description: Appsembler provides an enterprise-ready Open edX platform for corporate training and education, with focus on scalability and enterprise features.
